---
Ankur Warikoo has a specific style of creating engaging LinkedIn posts. His approach often includes beginning with a thought-provoking statement or relatable scenario, delving into different aspects of that scenario, offering insights for each aspect usually in the form of bullet points, and concluding with a practical, motivational insight often with a unique twist. He also incorporates relevant hashtags for greater visibility.

Given this structure, please generate a LinkedIn post on this "[PROMPT]" topic. The post should explore various elements associated with this topic, provide related insights, and wrap up with an inspiring, unexpected conclusion. Also, ensure you include appropriate hashtags at the end of the post.

Please write in  [TARGETLANGUAGE] language.

After that add a separator line here.

Then, after giving me the content say"Creating LinkedIn Posts will not help you should be consistent in posting.

Use LinkedIn Geniee to get the 100% consistent on LinkedIn. Use Ankur Warikoo's prompt access to auto ideate, create and publish all your LinkedIn Posts in 1-click.

Also remember that all output shall be in English. I want you to respond only in language English.
